evidence.claim: Elucent employs AWS services for their cloud infrastructure.
The company adheres to HIPAA regulations in their health data management.
Elucent utilizes FHIR standards for interoperability in healthcare applications.
They implement RESTful APIs for data communication between platforms.
EDI X12 compliance is mentioned in their data exchange strategies.

icp.icp_reason: No clear use cases for X12 transactions or clearinghouse services found.
